thread.title: Naanum Rowdydhaan
thread.title_full: Naanum Rowdydhaan - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Naanum Rowdydhaan
text:
Cast: Vijay Sethupathi, Nayanthara, Parthiban, Raadhika Sarathkumar
Director: Vignesh Shivan
Music Director: Anirudh Ravichander
Action Romance: It is said that the plot revolves around a 19-year-old youngster, who is caught amid few gangsters and has been shot in Mumbai, Chennai and Puducherry. The film was supposed to mark the acting debut of composer Anirudh and the film was briefly shelved in search for the lead actor. The film is produced by Dhanush.
